resources.string: Starburst is rumored to have inspired the pop art movement.

string-array.name: starburstFacts
string-array.item: Starburst is rumored to have inspired the pop art movement.
Starburst\'s slogan is \"Starburst: a pack of contradictions.\"
In the US, the Starburst\'s slogan is \"unexplainably juicy.\"
The original flavors were strawberry, orange, lemon, and lime. Lime was later replaced with cherry.
In the UK, the candies are vegetarian. In the US, they contain gelatin.
Starbursts were originally called Opal Fruits.
Starbursts were created in 1971 in the United Kingdom.
Starbursts contain real fruit juice and are a source of vitamin C.
Packs come in flavors such as Original, Tropical, Sour and Favereds.
It would take about 30 million packs of Starbursts to go from New York to Los Angeles.
